entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:21 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 09:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 09:19 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 09:19 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:19 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
